Wave 3 Battle Cards

Dampening Field

  1. What happens if my opponent is supposed to flip more than 4 cards during the battle?
    The extra cards are simply not flipped. It doesnâ€™t matter whether those extra flips were because of abilities like bold, a white battle icon, or any other ability.
  2. If I Bolster into a Multi Mission Gear, can I play Dampening Field and it activates?
    You can play Dampening Field, but it would be past the point where it would trigger.
